nodes.body: @BenVillalobos, looks like this one doesn't have it either, but with looking a little more, I think that makes sense. We're pulling from the release/5.0 branch, which doesn't have epanath's change. Either they would have to merge it back to the release/5.0 branch, or we would have to start pulling from Arcade's master branch, which might be ok.

@Forgind oh right, we're not pulling from master, good catch 🙃. Pulling from arcade's master branch would force us onto arcade 6. We have an issue tracking it https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/6119, which we should do in the somewhat near future. Until then, @epananth is it possible to get your change merged into the release/5.0 branch for arcade?
ah I made the fix to master and not to release/5.0 branch. That is the reason the update is not triggering.. I will try to get that merged today.
This should have the following commit by tomorrow: 8f851a6. When it does it's good to merge.
Finally this has my commit ! I think it is safe to merge this PR :)
